desc: At Goodie Girl, we believe in breaking the rules, being tastefully bold and embracing your inner “creative” rebel. It is what we strive to do every day, to “keep it real” and create ridiculously-delicious versions of your favorite childhood treats with no artificial anything.

layout.text:
The tasty flavor of brown sugar
baked perfectly crunchy and gluten free.
Find them online and on JetBlue!
